name: Steamed Mussels With Lovage
recipeYield: Serves 2 as a main course, 4 as an appetizer
keywords: appetizer, dry white wine, lovage, mussels, fall
recipeIngredient: 2 cups diced tomato or halved cherry tomatoes
3 tablespoons coarsely chopped young lovage leaves

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet or saucepan fitted with a lid, combine the mussels, wine, shallot, tomato, butter and pepper. Add 2 tablespoons of the lovage.
Cover and place over high heat until most of the mussels open. Shake the pan and continue to cook for 1 minute. Transfer to a serving bowl; sprinkle with the remaining lovage. Serve with bread.
